General.Name: Eagon Ind
General.Description: Eagon Industrial Co., Ltd. supplies building materials in South Korea and internationally. It offers aluminum, PVC, and wood windows and doors; curtain walls; explosion and bullet proof windows; glasses; building integrated photovoltaic and photovoltaic solutions; floors; removable dividers and doors; plywood; housing materials, such as sheathing materials, OSB, and engineered and deck wood; landscape products; guard rail products; and logistics products, such as green and plastic pellets, clip-lok, and C-box. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.
